languages.text: {n}Иеронимус обнажает желтые зубы в ехидной улыбке.{/n} "Воистину, {mf|сыне|дщерь}! Скорее я назову братом последнего негодяя, раскаявшегося в своих преступлениях, чем того, кто уверен в собственной непорочности".

traits.locale_text: {n}Иеронимус обнажает желтые зубы в ехидной улыбке.{/n} "Воистину, {mf|сыне|дщерь}! Скорее я назову братом последнего негодяя, раскаившегося в своих преступлениях, чем того, кто уверен в собственной непорочности".
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus bares his yellowed teeth in an acerbic grin.{/n} "Indeed! I would rather call the worst of all scoundrels my brother if he repents of his crimes, than someone convinced of their own soul's purity."
languages.original_text: {n}Иеронимус обнажает желтые зубы в ехидной улыбке.{/n} "Воистину, {mf|сыне|дщерь}! Скорее я назову братом последнего негодяя, раскаявшегося в своих преступлениях, чем того, кто уверен в собственной непорочности".

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus bares his yellowed teeth in an acerbic grin.{/n} "Indeed, my {mf|son|daughter}! I would rather call the worst of all scoundrels my brother or sister if they repent of their crimes, than someone convinced of their own soul's purity."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus bares his yellowed teeth in an acerbic grin.{/n} "Indeed, my {mf|son|daughter}! I would rather call the worst of all scoundrels my brother or sister if they repent of their crimes, than someone convinced of their own soul's purity."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus bares his yellowed teeth in an acerbic grin.{/n} "Indeed, my {mf|son|daughter}! I would rather call the worst of all scoundrels my comrades if they repent of their crimes, than someone convinced of their own soul's purity."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus bares his yellowed teeth in an acerbic grin.{/n} "Indeed, my {mf|son|daughter}! I would rather call the worst of all scoundrels my comrades if they repent of their crimes, than someone convinced of their own soul's purity."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus bares his yellowed teeth in an acerbic grin.{/n} "Indeed! I would rather call the worst of all scoundrels my brother if he repents of his crimes, than someone convinced of their own soul's purity."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus bares his yellowed teeth in an acerbic grin.{/n} "Indeed! I would rather call the worst of all scoundrels my brother if he repents of his crimes, than someone convinced of their own soul's purity."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: {n}希罗尼穆斯龇着发黄的牙齿，露出尖酸的笑容。{/n}“正是如此！只要他们愿意悔过自新，那我宁愿把那些最邪恶的恶棍当作我的伙伴，也不愿意与那些坚信自己灵魂纯洁无瑕的人为伍。”
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus bares his yellowed teeth in an acerbic grin.{/n} "Indeed! I would rather call the worst of all scoundrels my brother if he repents of his crimes, than someone convinced of their own soul's purity."

traits.locale_text: {n}希罗尼穆斯龇着发黄的牙齿，露出尖酸的笑容。{/n}“正是如此，我的{mf|孩子|女儿}！只要他们愿意悔过自新，那我宁愿把那些最邪恶的恶棍当成我的教友，也不愿意与那些坚信自己灵魂纯洁无瑕的人为伍。”
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: {n}ヒエロニムスは黄色い歯を見せ、不敵な笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「その通りだ！罪を悔い改めるのならば、最悪の悪党とも兄弟になれる。己の魂の純粋さを確信している者の方が厄介だ」
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus bares his yellowed teeth in an acerbic grin.{/n} "Indeed! I would rather call the worst of all scoundrels my brother if he repents of his crimes, than someone convinced of their own soul's purity."

traits.locale_text: {n}ヒエロニムスは黄色い歯を見せ、不敵な笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「その通りだ！罪を悔い改めるのならば、最悪の悪党とも兄弟になれる。己の魂の純粋さを確信している者の方が厄介だ」
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus enseña sus dientes amarillentos en una sonrisa áspera.{/n} «¡Así es! Prefiero considerar hermanos a los peores canallas si se arrepienten de sus crímenes que a alguien convencido de la pureza de su alma».
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus bares his yellowed teeth in an acerbic grin.{/n} "Indeed! I would rather call the worst of all scoundrels my brother if he repents of his crimes, than someone convinced of their own soul's purity."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus enseña sus dientes amarillentos en una sonrisa áspera.{/n} «¡Así es, hij{mf|o|a} mí{mf|o|a}! Prefiero considerar camaradas a los peores canallas si se arrepienten de sus crímenes que a alguien convencido de la pureza de su alma».
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus grinst bitter. Seine Zähne sind gelb.{/n} "Wohl wahr! Ich würde lieber die schlimmsten Schurken meine Brüder nennen, wenn sie ihre Verbrechen bereuen, als jemanden, der von der Reinheit seiner Seele überzeugt ist."
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus bares his yellowed teeth in an acerbic grin.{/n} "Indeed! I would rather call the worst of all scoundrels my brother if he repents of his crimes, than someone convinced of their own soul's purity."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus grinst bitter. Seine Zähne sind gelb.{/n} "Wohl wahr, {mf|mein Sohn|meine Tochter}! Ich würde lieber die schlimmsten Schurken meine Kameraden nennen, wenn sie ihre Verbrechen bereuen, als jemanden, der von der Reinheit seiner Seele überzeugt ist."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Hiéronymus vous répond avec un sourire acerbe qui découvre ses dents jaunes.{/n} « En effet ! Et je préfère de loin appeler camarade la pire des vermines si elle se repent de ses crimes, plutôt que quelqu'un convaincu à tort de la pureté de son âme. »
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus bares his yellowed teeth in an acerbic grin.{/n} "Indeed! I would rather call the worst of all scoundrels my brother if he repents of his crimes, than someone convinced of their own soul's purity."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hiéronymus vous répond avec un sourire acerbe qui découvre ses dents jaunes.{/n} « En effet, {mf|mon fils|ma fille} ! Et je préfère de loin appeler camarade la pire des vermines si elle se repent de ses crimes, plutôt que quelqu'un convaincu à tort de la pureté de son âme. »
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus, ekşi bir sırıtışla sararmış dişlerini açığa çıkarıyor.{/n} "Muhakkak! Kendi ruhunun saf olduğuna ikna olmuş birindense suçlarından pişmanlık duyan en beter haydutları kardeşim addetmeyi yeğlerim."
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus bares his yellowed teeth in an acerbic grin.{/n} "Indeed! I would rather call the worst of all scoundrels my brother if he repents of his crimes, than someone convinced of their own soul's purity."

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus ekşi bir sırıtışla sararmış dişlerini açığa çıkarıyor.{/n} "Muhakkak! Kendi ruhunun saf olduğuna ikna olmuş birindense, suçlarından pişmanlık duyan en beter haydutları kardeşim addetmeyi yeğlerim."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04
